pickipediainvitations-desc: Gates account creation behind invite codes with entity attestations
pickipediainvitations-must-be-logged-in: You must be logged in to create invites.
pickipediainvitations-createinvite-intro: Use this form to create an invite code for a new user. The invite code can only be used by the specified username.
pickipediainvitations-field-inviteename-: The exact username the invitee will use to register. They cannot register with a different name.
pickipediainvitations-field-entitytype-h: Is this account for a human or a bot? This creates an attestation on their user page.
pickipediainvitations-field-expiredays-h: Set to 0 for no expiration. Default is 30 days.
pickipediainvitations-error-badtoken: Invalid security token. Please try again.
pickipediainvitations-error-noname: Please enter a username for the invitee.
pickipediainvitations-success-message: An invite has been created for $1.
pickipediainvitations-success-share-inst: Send this link to the invitee. They must register with the exact username specified above.
pickipediainvitations-myinvites-none: You haven't created any invites yet.
pickipediainvitations-manageinvites-intr: This page shows all invites in the system. You can view invitation chains and revoke unused invites.
pickipediainvitations-manageinvites-none: No invites have been created yet.
pickipediainvitations-revoke-failed: Failed to revoke invite. It may have already been used.
pickipediainvitations-chain-genesis: $1 is a genesis user (created before the invitation system or bootstrapped).
pickipediainvitations-chain-intro: The following shows who invited $1 and the chain of invitations leading back to genesis users:
pickipediainvitations-chain-explanation: The first person in the list is the user, followed by who invited them, then who invited that person, and so on.
pickipediainvitations-code-required: An invite code is required to create an account.
pickipediainvitations-field-invitecode-h: Enter the invite code you received from an existing user.
